pages.text: Huge animals that will be angry when you attack them!$(br2)$(bold)Health: $()40 Hearts$(br)$(bold)Attack-Damage: $()5 Hearts$(br2)$(bold)Breeding Items: $()$(br)$(li)Wheat (only tamed ones)$(br2)Can be tamed with apples. Tamed Elephants can be ridden and equipped with a chest.
Can be found in all $(bold)Savanna$() biomes.
